page.title: 15A day for Sam in Haddenham.
page.content: I woke at 7am. I read my reading book "The Silver Sword". Then I went down to watch Popeye. I got ready for school and got my music ready. At school I found out that Mrs Blade had not come because her baby was ill. After assembly we were taught by Mrs Thorogood and we wrote a newspaper report about the Bernewode Games. I wrote about the Chinese Cricket match and my team lost. Then it was playtime. After that I did my group sports day picture of the teachers having sponges thrown at them. My group made a mess of our picture but that was soon fixed. We went home at 3.15. When my sister Victoria got home I went to watch the television and had my tea. Later I went to play rounders with her. 2 hours later I went to bed and did things like reading and knitting.
